Constructor Detail

SelectOntEntry

public SelectOntEntry(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                      boolean allowAdd)
Used to display the argument ontology tree so an element can be selected

Parameters:
display - - points back to the display
allowAdd - - true if new entries can be added (usually not allowed)
Method Detail

populateTree

void populateTree(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeItem node,
                  java.lang.String parentName)
Populates the ontology tree from the rationale database. This is a recursive method that calls itself to add new children to the current root node.

Parameters:
node - - the root node for the tree
parentName - - the name of the parent at the root node.

getSelOntEntry

public OntEntry getSelOntEntry()
Get the selected item from the tree

Returns:
the selected ontology entry
